title: The Trump admin will encourage—not hinder—U.S. leadership in blockchain technology and cryptocurrency. We must seize the moment
description: After years of uncertainty under Biden, the Trump admin promises clear, consistent regulations for digital assets.
author: Chase Ergen
excerpt: After years of uncertainty under Biden, the Trump admin promises clear, consistent regulations for digital assets.
text: BYChase ErgenChase Ergen—an entrepreneur, investor, and philanthropist—is executive director of Make America Wealthy Again, a pro-DeFi Super PAC undergoing registration.
html:
BYChase Ergen

Chase Ergen—an entrepreneur, investor, and philanthropist—is executive director of Make America Wealthy Again, a pro-DeFi Super PAC undergoing registration.
